revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Vegetation | name = Tree | class = ZTree | game = Hexen | doomednum = 25 }}[[Classes]]: ZTree
{{desc}}In Hexen.wad, the sprite is actually named TRE1A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR ZTree { {{Property|Radius}} 15 {{Property|Height}} 128 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: ZTRE A -1 Stop } }
